test-case.name: cbcl-date-gt-001
test-case.description: Test that comparing large dates does not overflow.

modified.change: allow implementations to reject these dates

test-case.name: cbcl-date-le-001
test-case.description: Test that comparing large dates does not overflow.

modified.change: allow implementations to reject these dates

test-case.name: cbcl-date-greater-equal-001
test-case.description: test comparison of date
test-case.test: declare function local:two-digit($number as xs:integer) { let $string := string($number) return if (string-length($string) lt 2) then concat('0', $string) else $string }; declare function local:date($year as xs:integer, $month as xs:integer, $day as xs:integer) { let $m := local:two-digit($month), $d := local:two-digit($day) return xs:date(concat($year, '-', $m, '-', $d)) }; not(local:date(2008, 05, 12) lt xs:date("1972-12-15"))

test-case.description: test comparison of date

test-case.name: cbcl-date-greater-than-011
test-case.description: test comparison of date
test-case.test: declare function local:date($date as xs:date, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $date }; exists(local:date(xs:date("1972-12-15"), fn:true()) gt xs:date("1972-12-15"))

test-case.name: cbcl-date-greater-than-012
test-case.description: test comparison of date
test-case.test: declare function local:date($date as xs:date, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $date }; local:date(xs:date("1972-12-15"), fn:false()) gt xs:date("1972-12-15")

test-case.name: cbcl-date-greater-than-013
test-case.description: test comparison of date
test-case.test: declare function local:date($date as xs:date, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $date }; exists(local:date(xs:date("1972-12-15"), fn:true()) le xs:date("1972-12-15"))

test-case.name: cbcl-date-greater-than-014
test-case.description: test comparison of date
test-case.test: declare function local:date($date as xs:date, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $date }; local:date(xs:date("1972-12-15"), fn:false()) le xs:date("1972-12-15")

test-case.name: cbcl-date-greater-than-015
test-case.description: test comparison of date
test-case.test: declare function local:date($date as xs:string, $timezone as xs:string) { xs:date( concat($date, $timezone) ) }; adjust-date-to-timezone(local:date("1972-12-14", "-12:00")) gt adjust-date-to-timezone(xs:date("1972-12-15+12:00"))

test-case.name: cbcl-date-greater-than-016
test-case.description: test comparison of date
test-case.test: declare function local:date($date as xs:string, $timezone as xs:string) { xs:date( concat($date, $timezone) ) }; adjust-date-to-timezone(local:date("1972-12-14", "-12:00")) ge adjust-date-to-timezone(xs:date("1972-12-15+12:00"))
